vicedtools.vce package

Submodules

vicedtools.vce.schoolscores module

Functions for working with VCE school scores.

vicedtools.vce.schoolscores.parse_vass_school_scores_file(file_name)

Converts the data in VASS school score export into a pandas DataFrame.

VASS school score exports contain scores in a HTML table. This function reads the relevant values into a DataFrame.

Parameters

file_name – The path of the school scores export.

Returns

A DataFrame containing the total score results from the VASS export.

Return type

DataFrame

vicedtools.vce.vasssession module

A requests Session class for exporting data from VASS.

class vicedtools.vce.vasssession.VASSSession(username='', password='', grid_password='')

Bases: Session

Creates a requests Session with VASS authentication completed.

Parameters

  • username – The username to login with

  • password – The password to login with

  • grid_password – The grid password to login with. A sequence of tuples, each tuple being the grid coordinate of the next password character. Must be given in top-> bottom, left-> right order.

Returns

An instance of requests.Session with authentication to VASS completed.

change_year(year)

Changes the year in VASS.

Parameters

year – The year to change to.

Return type

None

external_results(file_name)

Saves the student external results (study scores) to a csv.

Parameters

file_name – The file name to save the data as.

gat_summary(file_name)

Extracts student GAT results and saves them to a csv.

Parameters

file_name – The file name for the csv to save the data to.

Return type

None

moderated_coursework_scores(file_name)

Extracts moderated scores for school scores for all GAs and saves to a csv.

Parameters

file_name – The filename to save the data to.

Return type

None

personal_details_summary(file_name)

Saves the student personal details summary to a csv file.

Parameters

file_name – The file name to save the data to.

predicted_scores(file_name, **kwargs)

Exports student achieved and predicted scores from Report 17.

Defaults to downloading data for the currently selected year in VASS.

Parameters

  • file_name – The csv to save to.

  • year – Optional, download data for the given year.

  • years – Optional, download data for the given list of years. Will be ignored if the parameter year is given.

school_program_summary(file_name, report='vce')

Saves the school program summary to a csv file.

Parameters

  • file_name – The file name to save the data to.

  • report – “vce”, “vet” or “vcal”

school_scores(file_name)

Extracts school score data for all GAs and saves to a csv.

Parameters

file_name – The filename to save the data to.

Return type

None

exception vicedtools.vce.vasssession.VassLoginError

Bases: Exception

Error with vass login.

vicedtools.vce.vasswebdriver module

Functions for automating the export of data from VASS.

Deprecated: The VASSWebDriver class is being replaced by VASSSession, a requests.Sessions based class.

class vicedtools.vce.vasswebdriver.VASSWebDriver(iedriver_path, username='', password='', grid_password='', os_type='win32')

Bases: WebDriver

Creates a webdriver with VASS authentication completed.

Deprecated: Use the VASSSession class to reduce the reliance on Internet Explorer.

Creates an instance of selenium.webdriver.Ie and authenticates to VASS.

Parameters

  • iedriver_path – The path to geckodriver.exe

  • username – The username to login with

  • password – The password to login with

  • grid_password – The grid password to login with. A sequence of tuples, each tuple being the grid coordinate of the next password character. Must be given in top-> bottom, left-> right order.

  • os_type – The os type, defaults to win32 as win64 is slow

Returns

An instance of selenium.webdriver.ie with authentication to VASS completed.

change_year(year)

Changes the year in VASS.

Parameters

year – The year to change to.

Return type

None

predicted_scores(file_name)

Exports student achieved and predicted scores from Report 17.

Uses the currently selected year in VASS even though the Report 17 UI allows for year selection.

Parameters

file_name – The csv to save to.

vicedtools.vce.vasswebdriver.click_with_retry(element, test)

Tries fives times to click a webdriver element, stopping if test passes.

Used to deal with IE driver unreliability.

Parameters

  • element – A webdriver element.

  • test – A function that returns True if click was successful.

Returns

Whether click was successful.

vicedtools.vce.vasswebdriver.current_frame(driver)

Returns the name of the webdriver’s current frame.

Return type

str

vicedtools.vce.vasswebdriver.find_window(driver, window_title)

Find the window handle with a particular title.

Parameters

  • driver – A webdriver instance.

  • window_title – The window title to locate.

Returns

The window handle of the window, if found. Otherwise, None.

Return type

str

vicedtools.vce.vasswebdriver.is_menu_item_displayed(driver, xpath_expr)

Tests to see if a given menu item is displayed in VASS.

Used to deal with unreliable clicks in IE.

Parameters

  • driver – An instance of VASSWebDriver.

  • xpath_expr – An xpath expression that matches the menu item.

Return type

bool
